comment.author: 42264328@N00
comment._content: Wikipedia article--USS Utah (BB-31), commissioned 1911. The ship was heavily damaged and capsized at Pearl Harbor, and the wreck is still there today.

comment.author: 28842553@N02
comment._content: The Utah Memorial is on the opposite side of Ford Island from Battleship Row and USS Arizona.  Sadly, UTAH is widely unknown and the memorial goes mostly unnoticed.
